articles.title: Verizon outage affects tens of thousands of users, tracking site shows
articles.description:
The site’s outage map showed that the most disruptions were in major metropolitan areas such as Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco, Washington and Portland, Oregon.

The post Verizon outage affects tens of thousands of users, tracking site shows appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Another New England state edged out Mass. as the healthiest in the nation
articles.description:
New Hampshire ranked as the healthiest state for the fourth consecutive year, with Vermont and Connecticut following Massachusetts in third and fourth, respectively.

The post Another New England state edged out Mass. as the healthiest in the nation appeared first on Boston.com.
